summary: The Maryland State Board of Physicians' Disciplinary Panel B summarily suspended Daniel Metz, P.A.'s license on June 3, 2025, due to an imperative risk to public health, safety, and welfare. On June 18, 2025, after Mr. Metz waived his right to a post-deprivation hearing, the Panel reaffirmed the summary suspension, determining a substantial risk of serious harm from his continued practice.
